title: What is your favorite champion?
body:
What is your favorite champion?

my favorite champion in lane is:{{champion:45}} he is really fun to play and easy to play......

my favorite jungler is:{{champion:9}} i love his ult just go behind a wall then give bot lane a heart attack XD

my favorite champion(s) in general is:{{champion:222}} /{{champion:17}}  evil is bae

replies.body: Reminds me of Froggens champion counter list.
im absolute trash with her but vi is the funnest champ ive ever played, and new talon looks pretty fun too

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qicBAmkB,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-10-20T00:08:13.132+0000)
>
> im absolute trash with her but vi is the funnest champ ive ever played, and new talon looks pretty fun too

ya they better make him balanced and not too op like the talon now XD
you're right, parkour requires extreme balance.

Top Lane {{champion:27}} {{champion:75}}  still saving IP for my 3rd used to be Fav. {{champion:122}} 


And when I used to be a Support {{champion:412}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:12}}

{{champion:203}}, The lore is simple, but feels so good THEIR lines are good, and the lamb's voice is so godamn soothing. I love how they have to counterjungle, and in general just love almost everything about them. The only thing I dislike is their skins.

Supports

{{champion:37}}  before her rework

{{champion:89}} when i switched form Sona to a tank support

{{champion:267}}  when i found Sona 2.0  and she's now my main Bae

Mid

{{champion:103}} 

{{champion:25}} hehehehehehe i love Morg

Mid/Top/JG 

{{champion:131}} Cuz she's got the crazy Q+R resets. dmg, and tank for days :3
